room_title: Escape room "Esmerelda's Curse" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
room_description: You've accidentally stumbled onto the oddities shop owned by the late Madame Rosa. She had foreseen her own murder and set a trap for the killer. The Esmerelda's Curse is to trap anyone who enters the shop for all eternity... Your future is now uncertain, and with Madame Rose's spirit trying to make things right, you have an hour left to escape the parlor!
